title: Reforestación inteligente (Smart Reforestation)
itunes:title: Reforestación inteligente (Smart Reforestation)
description:
After experiencing climate change-fueled wildfires in person, a young Spanish businessman searches for a solution to reforest the planet, with help from a tree-whispering monk.

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3Gaew0g.
